main event: Two witnesses reported observing bright lights in the sky moving in a zigzag pattern in Junction City, Kansas.
interesting points: The lights were seen on November 4, 1964, around 12-14 p.m.,The witnesses described the lights as being very bright and appearing to be controlled from somewhere,At one point, the lights hovered for a few minutes before taking off at high speed,The observation lasted approximately 15 minutes,The report concluded there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: bright lights moving in a zigzag pattern
